item.description:
Meet at Dunkin Donuts Randolph on Route 28 at 9:00, leave at 9:30 There will be a stop at the rest area on Rt 128. We plan on eating at Woodman’s (seafood fare and more) but need to be done eating by 12:45 to get to Wolf Hollow in time to buy tickets. Tickets go on sale at 1:00 so we have to be there at that time. Admission $7.50 Adults, $5.00 Seniors, $5.00 Children (Ages 3-17)    Show starts at 1:30. If anyone is interested, we will make a stop for Ice Cream before getting on Route 128 to return home. Riders have to be aware It is a long day using the highway and the Expressway. We will be back by 5:00.

 

Wolf Hollow, 114 Essex Road, Ipswich. Formal Presentation at 1:30 PM only, weather permitting. Wolf Hollow is a non-profit organization established in 1990 to teach people about the importance of the wolf in the wild. Wolf Hollow offers a unique opportunity to view gray wolves in as natural a setting as possible. Come see how they interact with their pack members and live in a social unit very similar to human families.
item.name: North Shore Ride \ Wolf Hollow (Level 3)
